data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Faccoli, Massimo, Sidoti, Agatino (2013): Description of Phloeosinus laricionis sp. n. (Coleoptera: Curculionidae, Scolytinae), a new bark beetle species from southern Europe. Zootaxa 3722 (1): 92-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3722.1.8
